content.raw:
I don't see separate boxes for the fingers, just a big box around Val.  I attached a screenshot to the original issue.
I see the val_grasping code starting up in the launch file.

I used meld to double check the urdf and it is the same as the updated one from Stephen Peters.  However, I did also notice that the problem with Val's head drooping when the neck pitch gets too large has returned.  I'll keep looking into it.  I did do an update today, so perhaps I somehow messed it up.
content.html:
I don't see separate boxes for the fingers, just a big box around Val. I attached a screenshot to the original issue. I see the val_grasping code starting up in the launch file.

I used meld to double check the urdf and it is the same as the updated one from Stephen Peters. However, I did also notice that the problem with Val's head drooping when the neck pitch gets too large has returned. I'll keep looking into it. I did do an update today, so perhaps I somehow messed it up.
